caption.p: Distribution of herd sizes according to the type of production sites (BS, boar studs; FA, farrowing; FF, farrow-to-finish; FI, finisher; FWP, Farrowing-post-weaning; MU, multiplier; PW, post-weaning; PWF, post-weaningâ€”finishing; SEL, nucleus; SP, small production; TR, trade center; WB, wild boars) ( 18).
